name: The local monster
description:
This is game I made for spooktober jam. I hope you will like it :)

story : every halloween comes to life a wierd pumpkin monster and he killing the local villagers. In this day because of rob in the village the cops came to here. and the monster started to kill them... at the start the villagers ran away. after they are attacking. after they are called to more policemans. and at the end they called to the army. And...  are you belive thats story is true ? sounds a bit wierd for me

controls : A D - right and left , WS = forward and backward, click ( attacking must equip a weapon and sometimes it makes a magic). F (can damage enemies and makes you faster)

Credits : music - nuerwind , carter, 
sounds - qubodup , Dneproman, ienba, AlineAudio, harpoyume, RedRoxPeterPepper, Unaxete, MoiraM, scotcampbell
textures : Voysla, PXFUE, pixabay 5933179
assets : Tom Shannon LLC, Infinity Blade: Effects
